title: Potion of Healing
description: Restore 2 hp.

title: Potion of Greater Healing
description: Restore 4 hp.

title: Potion of Focus
description: Provides 2 extra actions until end of turn.

title: Potion of Haste
description: Provides 1 extra movement per action until end of turn.

title: Elixir of Fortitude
description: Provides 10 addtional max hp until end of next turn.

title: Elixir of Rage
description: Grants 2 additional attack damage until end of turn.

title: Elixir of Life
description: Restore a fallen ally to full hp at the location of his/her death.

title: Dragon's Blood
description: Increased fortune to the user - Guarantee the success of your next coin flip.

title: Scroll of Return
description: Return to town.

title: Scroll of Immunity
description: Prevent all damage until end of next turn.

title: Scroll of Silence
description: Prevent target hero from casting any spells until end of next turn.

title: Tome of Knowledge
description: Grant user +3 experience points.

title: Tome of Power
description: Grant user +1 damage to his/her physical attacks for the rest of the game.

title: Tome of Foresight
description: Look at opposing player's hand.

title: Poisnous Vile
description: Discard 1 healing potion card and deal X damage to an adjacent hero.

title: Explosive Cocktail
description: Deal X damage to any hero up to 3 spaces from the user. Where 'X' is half the target's current HP rounded down to the nearest whole number.

title: Coat of Arms
description: The user cannot perform physical attacks until this card is resolved. If this character survives until his/her next turn then gain 5 experience points.

title: Sleight of Hand
description: Steal 2 reward cards at random from your opponent's hand.

title: Disenchant
description: Chose one enchantment on any hero and have them discard that card.

title: Salvage
description: Return one discarded enchantment card from the discard pile to one of your heroes.

title: Protection
description: Grant user +2 hp.

title: Resistance
description: Reduced spell damage taken by 2.

title: Speed
description: Increased movements per action by +1 once per turn.

title: Evasion
description: Chance to dodge physical attacks - Roll 1d6 if 6 then dodge successful.

title: Briars
description: Return 1 damage to physical attackers per attack received.

title: Fire
description: User's attacks burn for 1 damage on the receiver's next turn.

title: Ice
description: User's attack cause target's movement actions to use 1 additional action.

title: Force
description: User's physical attacks knock back the receiver 1 space in any direction of the user's choosing.

title: Power
description: Flip a coin. If heads, user's attacks deal 2 additionl damage on physical attacks.

title: Executioner
description: User rolls a 6 sided die when attacking and if a 6 is rolled their attack deals 2x more damage.
